ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : nat Hf : R Hg : forall t : R, f t = g t H : ex_derive_n f x Hf Unable to unify "is_linear (fun y : ?K => scal y (minus ?M2436 ?M2437)) /\\ (forall x0 : AbsRing_NormedModule ?K, is_filter_lim (locally ?M2435) x0 -> is_domin (locally ?M2435) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule ?K => minus y x0) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule ?K => minus (minus ((fun x1 : ?K => minus (?M2433 x1) (?M2434 x1)) y) ((fun x1 : ?K => minus (?M2433 x1) (?M2434 x1)) x0)) ((fun y0 : ?K => scal y0 (minus ?M2436 ?M2437)) (minus y x0))))" with "match x with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n g n) Hf end".

original: intros f g x Hf Hg. unfold ex_derive in *. destruct Hf as [lf Hlf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hlg]. exists (minus lf lg). apply is_derive_minus; auto.
